text: Laurent Lamothe (born 14 August 1972) is a Haitian politician and businessman. He was the Prime minister of Haiti from 16 May 2012 to 14 December 2014.http://www.chicagotribune.com/news/sns-mct-presidential-decree-names- lamothe-haiti-prime-20120505,0,908081.story ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Haiti
title: Laurent Lamothe
